definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: Answer , from reader Olivier Coudert: The cheating husband problem is a classic recursion pb.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个典型的递归问题。

sentences.english: An ergodic recursive Algorithm is suggested for the analyse of the reliability of distribution grid.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种分析配电网供电可靠性的遍历递归算法。

sentences.english: To the grammar which assigns eliminates the left recursion.
sentences.chinese: 对给定的文法消除左递归。

sentences.english: All right, any questions about that. Yeah?
sentences.chinese: 递归调用来解决其他问题？

sentences.english: The Analysis of Cognitive Processes in Solving Tower of Hanoi;
sentences.chinese: 汉诺塔问题是典型的只有用递归方法才能解决的问题。

sentences.english: These two steps repeat recursively and depth first.
sentences.chinese: 这两步递归地以深度优先的方式重复。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a recursive forecast method for elevator traffic flow based on outlier detection.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于异常值检测的电梯交通流递归预测方法。

sentences.english: It's configured to perform recursion or use a forwarder.
sentences.chinese: 它被配置来执行递归或者使用转发器。

sentences.english: In math and engineering, recursion, especially, is a big win.
sentences.chinese: 在数学和工程中，递归获得了重大胜利。

sentences.english: A family of new hyperstable adaptive recursive filter algorithms are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一类新的超稳定自适应递归滤波算法。

sentences.english: It can be shown that this recursive solution takes exponential time to run.
sentences.chinese: 可以证明，这种递归解法需要耗费指数级的时间。

sentences.english: Consider what would happen with a recursive method, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 例如，考虑在一个递归方法中会发生的事情。

sentences.english: This type of algorithm is called block adaptive recursive algorithm (BARA).
sentences.chinese: 这种新算法称为块自适应递归算法。

sentences.english: "To iterate is human, to recurse divine. " (L. Peter Deutsch)
There is no way to specify whether subgroups are evaluated recursively or not.
sentences.chinese: 不存在指定是否要递归地计算子组的方法。

sentences.english: It is compared with the segment linear interpolation method with regression.
sentences.chinese: 同时比较了分段线性插值加递归的信道估计方法。

definition: to pass an argument (computing)/abbr. for 傳遞參數|传递参数[chuan2 di4 can1 shu4]
